name: vivaldi autumn mitts
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
notes:
vivaldi autumn mitts is the third pair in ***the four seasons*** collection.

it is widely believed that antonio vivaldiâ€™s inspiration for the four seasons stems from the time he spent as the court chapel master in the gorgeous countryside of mantua, italy.

this is autumn
the scent of woodsmoke curling from chimneys. vibrant leaves turned ocher, sienna, burgundy, crimson, and gold. a sense of quiet as they flutter and fall, and the earth settles into a season of stillness. darkness comes early beckoning us to turn inward and rest.

these mitts are sized for tiny, smallish, and larger hands using heavier yarn and larger needles.

the pattern is written for magic loop but can easily be adapted for dpns.

the lace portion is rhythmic, intuitive, easy to memorize and is 
written and charted. 

vivaldi autumn mitts have been test knit.
